thread.title: Trump: Biden "did the smart thing" for not running
thread.title_full: Trump: Biden "did the smart thing" for not running

title: Trump: Biden "did the smart thing" for not running
text:
Trump: Biden "did the smart thing" for not running Wednesday, October 21, 2015 - 00:56 
U.S. Republican Presidential Candidate Donald Trump weighs in on Vice President Joe Biden's decision not to run in 2016, says, ''frankly, I really want to run against Hillary.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
ROUGH CUT (NO REPORTER NARRATION) During a campaign event in Burlington Iowa on Wednesday evening, U.S. Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said he would prefer to run against former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton than Vice President Joe Biden. "Biden is not running, and I think he did the smart thing, because frankly, I don't know that he would have won. He wouldn't have gotten the nomination," Trump, the Republican frontrunner, said about Biden's decision not to run. "Frankly, I really want to run against Hillary, I really do... You go against that record, you're just going to win, we're going to win," Trump said of the former Secretary of State and First Lady.
